ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Re: Can novelty search be treated as an optimization technique?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Peter and Ken, We actually just recently combined CMA-ES with topology search (though not NEAT-based) in a paper submitted to PPSN. I ll make the paper
